enchantment.enchantedpotato.run_like_hel: When reduced below critical health, gain temporary invisibility and speed. Triggers a cooldown period.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.black_parade: Grants Speed on kill and extends duration if active.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.grace_of_gun: Whether it hits the target or not, the arrow will always damage the nearest living entity within the line of sight at the time of firing.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.pressurized_: Arrows create a gravitational vortex on impact, pulling non-player entities toward the epicenter. Range and force scale with draw duration and enchantment level.
When hurt, knock back nearby monsters and inflict slowness. Cooldown decreases with enchantment level.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.grace_of_gai: Reduces damage taken at low depths. Reduction increases proportionally with depth. Boots only.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.guren_no_yum: Fully drawn arrows ignite enemies in a radius on impact. Burn duration and area scale with enchantment level.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.lora_trainer: Deals bonus damage to mob types you've mastered. Higher levels reduce kill requirements and increase damage multiplier.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.ripple_of_de: Releases a death ripple on kill, damaging nearby hostile mobs for a percentage of their max health. Damage and range scale with level.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.poison_of_th: Attacking mobs won't anger their allies and prevents slimes from splitting.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.dissolve.des: Reduces excess damage taken when hit surpasses a percentage of health, granting Strength.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.mark_from_th: Grants mining speed boost while underground, with greater effect at lower depths.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.armor_breaki: Attacks inflict targets with ArmorBreaking decay, drastically reducing their armor and toughness.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.nature_bless: Periodically heals you and releases nature power to damage and knockback foes.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.caressing_mo: Deal extras damage for entities with harmful potion effects.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.ocean_hued.d: Stores healing energy, releasing as oceanic wrath on attack to damage the target and nearby undead.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.lotus_in_wat: Immune to being pushed by fluids.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.unite_stones: Replaces drops from specific stones with Stone/Cobblestone. Some stones may drop Quartz when mined without Silk Touch.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.law_of_inert: Entities repelled by you will deal inertia damage to other entities during their retreat.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.mending_mirr: Broken items enter stasis and reappear after sleeping - restored to 30% durability but lose this enchantment.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.sacred_riftw: The less your health is, the higher your damage bonus is
enchantment.enchantedpotato.mercy.desc: Prevent fatal strikes, leaving targets at 1 HP.
enchantment.enchantedpotato.space_leapfr: Press Space Leapfrog key to teleport forward and explode the original position.
